objects.text:
• 7-Quart Capacity
• Digital Timer Control
• Locking Travel Lid
• Dishwasher Safe

product_details.description: Whether you’re feeding friends and family at home, or taking your meal on the go or to an event, the Crockpot 7 QT Cook & Carry Programmable Slow Cooker makes sharing a home-cooked meal with loved ones easy and effortless. The Cook & Carry travel-proof locking lid provides a tight seal to prevent leaks and spills, for no mess on the go, and convenient handles make it easy to carry and take your favorite slow cooked meals anywhere. A digital countdown control allows you to easily program your slow cooker from 30 minutes up to 20 hours. When cooking is completed, temperature automatically shifts to warm mode to avoid overcooking. The digital display also lets you track your meal progress and monitor remaining cook time. With a 7-quart capacity, it cooks meals for 9+ people, perfect for feeding a crowd. When you’re finished slow cooking, both the lid and the stoneware can be placed in the dishwasher for easy cleanup.

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern, grid-style promotional layout divided into four quadrants with alternating shades of light and dark gray. The top-left quadrant features a bold headline text layer ("heading") followed by a smaller subheading text layer ("subheading"), with a subtle circular graphic behind it. To the right, a realistic product image ("product_image") of a slow cooker is centered within a lighter background for contrast. In the bottom-left quadrant, key product highlights are listed in bullet form using the "description" text layer. Below, the "price" layer prominently displays the product price. A dark rectangular button with the "cta" text layer prompts user action. Design enhancements include diagonal lines, dashed horizontal lines, and accent dot decorations.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Gray (#F5F5F5)
- Medium Gray (#D6D6D6)
- Dark Gray (#707070, #888888)
- Accent Gray (#444444, #333333, #555555, #999999)
product_color: The product image showcases a modern Crockpot with a sleek and neutral gray color palette, creating a clean and professional look. The primary color is a medium slate gray (Hex: #6B6B6B), which forms the body of the appliance. This is complemented by a lighter gray accent (Hex: #C2C2C2) around the lid and control panel, providing contrast and visual hierarchy. White elements (Hex: #FFFFFF) are used for text and button highlights, ensuring clarity and focus. These colors blend smoothly while maintaining distinct zones through subtle shading, creating depth. A minimalistic beige tone (Hex: #F0EAD6) adds warmth to the interface area.
